author: rbb
msg: Add a couple of necessary brackets to the windows version of getopt
(this may be removed soon and Windows will just use the Unix version).  I
do not personally see how this was ever working correctly.

author: rbb
msg: Remove Beos specific file_io directory.  The file that was left there was
basically just an old version of the file from Unix, so BeOS should be
using the Unix routines directly for file_io.

author: rbb
msg: Remove the check for pthread_sigmask.  This function is never used inside

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Fix return code on failure to create a file handle's mutex lock.

author: wrowe
msg: Create a true misc.c for ap_get_oslevel and ap_load_dll_func,
and clean up the naming of the entire LoadLateDll declaration.
